mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_INBSINFDLT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDTYPE = #{IDType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDNUM = #{IDNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFSURCCODE = #{InfSurcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where INBSINFDLTSEQNO = #{InBsInfDltSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select INBSINFDLTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, NAME, IDTYPE, IDNUM, INFSURCCODE,REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_INBSINFDLT
